attributes.action: HGV vehicles to be banished to the inside lane and movement restricted to 22.00-06.00
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It makes sense, when they have worn out the inside lanes HGV's can be diverted onto the hard shoulder for carridgeway repairs. Coupled with flexability in the work place theres no need for pay as you go driving.
 Parliment wont like that though because all they want is revenue.
We have been robbed long enough.
If they dont sort it we should all remove our number plates in protest can you imagine the chaos.
I just wish these obnoctious MPs would listen to the people.
Blairs response to our petition on pay as  you drive is typical, no wonder people dont vote.
The Health service is a mess, so is transport, we dont have alternatives.
Gas , water and electric are privatised what exactly are we voting for with these people. Its about time we re-nationalised and stood together to make this country great again, some how i think were too late.
Give us our freedom back our roads are choked to death!
